intent_atoms.description: Add FoundationUI as a Swift Package dependency to ISOInspectorApp and verify successful builds with the new target, establishing foundation for UI component migration.
FoundationUI added as dependency in Package.swift under ISOInspectorApp target.
Package resolves successfully: swift package resolve completes without errors.
Clean build succeeds: swift build completes for all platforms.
Test build succeeds: swift test compiles without errors.
Platform requirements validated: macOS 13+, iOS/iPadOS 16+, no conflicts with existing dependencies.
FoundationUI imports work in app targets (import FoundationUI compiles).

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Dependency Management
functional_units.description: Adds FoundationUI as a Swift Package dependency to ISOInspectorApp and ensures all targets can import it.

functional_units.name: Package Resolution Verification
functional_units.description: Runs swift package resolve to fetch and validate the FoundationUI package without errors.

functional_units.name: Build Verification Across Platforms
functional_units.description: Compiles ISOInspectorApp for macOS, iOS, and iPadOS using swift build, ensuring no build failures.

functional_units.name: Test Build Verification
functional_units.description: Compiles test targets with swift test, confirming that tests compile successfully.

functional_units.name: Import Verification Test
functional_units.description: Creates a minimal test file to import FoundationUI and access basic components like DS.Badge.

functional_units.name: Platform Requirements Validation
functional_units.description: Checks that the app meets minimum macOS 13+ and iOS/iPadOS 16+ requirements and updates if needed.

functional_units.name: CI/CD Pipeline Integration
functional_units.description: Ensures the CI/CD pipeline passes with the new FoundationUI dependency added.

functional_units.name: SwiftLint Compliance Check
functional_units.description: Runs swiftlint to verify no lint violations are introduced by adding the dependency.

functional_units.name: Documentation Updates
functional_units.description: Updates README, changelog and developer onboarding docs to reflect the foundation UI integration.
